A

afterHandlingRequest() - Method in class tud.se.httpd.HttpServer
This hook method is called after each processed client socket.
afterProcessingRequest() - Method in class tud.se.httpd.HttpWorker
A hook method, which is called after each processed request.

G

Returns the file name of the error page.

Returns the method of the request.

Returns the port on which this web server should listen.

Returns the number of already received client connetions.
getRequestNum() - Method in class tud.se.httpd.HttpWorker
Returns the number of already processes requests.

Returns the document root for this web server.
getSocket() - Method in class tud.se.httpd.HttpRequest
Returns the client socket from which the request is read.
getTarget() - Method in class tud.se.httpd.HttpRequest
Returns the URL of the requested target.
getVersion() - Method in class tud.se.httpd.HttpRequest
Returns the version string of the http request.

H

HttpConfig - class tud.se.httpd.HttpConfig.
Parses and stores the config of the http server.

A simple exception class.

Constructs an empty exception.

Constructs an exception with an error message.

HttpRequest - class tud.se.httpd.HttpRequest.
Parses a clients request.
HttpRequest(Socket) - Constructor for class tud.se.httpd.HttpRequest
Contructs a request while parsing the data from a client socket.
HttpResponse - class tud.se.httpd.HttpResponse.
Construct and sends the response to a HttpRequest.
HttpResponse(HttpRequest, HttpConfig) - Constructor for class tud.se.httpd.HttpResponse
Constructs a HttpResponse for a given request and config.
HttpServer - class tud.se.httpd.HttpServer.
The HttpServer maintains the server socket and accepts each connection from a client an passes it to its HttpWorker.
HttpServer(HttpConfig) - Constructor for class tud.se.httpd.HttpServer
Constructs an HttpServer for a given HttpConfig.
HttpWorker - class tud.se.httpd.HttpWorker.
An HttpWorker takes sockets connected to clients, parses their request, builds the matching response and sends it over the client socket.
HttpWorker(HttpConfig) - Constructor for class tud.se.httpd.HttpWorker
Constructs an HttpWorker for a given HttpConfig.
halt() - Method in class tud.se.httpd.HttpServer
This method stopps the server thread gracefully.

P

Parses the http request accourding to RFC 2616.
process(Socket) - Method in class tud.se.httpd.HttpWorker
Processes a request from a client socket.

R

response() - Method in class tud.se.httpd.HttpResponse
Processes the client's request.
run() - Method in class tud.se.httpd.HttpServer
The main server loop.

S

setWorker(HttpWorker) - Method in class tud.se.httpd.HttpServer
Sets the worker to which all accepted client socket should be passed.

T

tud.se.httpd - package tud.se.httpd
A small web server is implemented with this package.
